alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 2:41PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...AN AREA OF SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHWESTERN GOSHEN... NORTHEASTERN LARAMIE AND SOUTHEASTERN PLATTE COUNTIES... At 240 PM MST...An area of snow showers was affecting portions of southwestern Goshen...northeastern Laramie and southeastern Platte Counties. Periods of snow showers will persist through 330 PM MST. HAZARD...Sudden and brief snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour, winds in excess of 25 mph, and visibilities less than one half mile. SOURCE...Radar and Webcams. IMPACT...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick roads and low visibilities. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Lingle, Chugwater, Yoder, Chugcreek, Bordeaux, Y-O Ranch, Slater, Meriden Rest Area, Veteran, and Lakeview North. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 39 and 82. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; South Laramie Range Foothills
